effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
